modName: Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower (Alternate Face CBBE)
summary:
Alternate facegendata for Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower mod.
There are only 2 files, just overwrite those in the main mod!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]There are only 2 files in the archive, just overwrite those in the main mod! Install manually or with the manager![/size]
Download the version you want!

[color=#ff0000][size=4][i][b]Note:[/b][/i][/size][/color] [color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]If you don't like the new face, please walk away! comments This is a [color=#ff0000]face mod[/color] not a [color=#00ff00]body mod[/color]![/b][/size][/color]

Frequently asked questions:

Q:"Who is this mod for?"
A: This mod is for those that wish to change the facial appearance of Sofia, because they feel her original appearance wasn't as they wanted.

Q:"This mod sucks, why did you make it?"
A: Pointless comments such as these have no place in the discussion of the mod, and I'm not going to indulge by answering them. If you feel compelled to rage just because this mod isn't for you, you either didn't read this or you're a troll.

Q: "Do you take requests?"
A: Yes.

[color=#00ffff][size=5]Required mods:[/size][/color]
1.  [color=#00ffff][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower[/url][/size][/color]
2.  [color=#00ffff][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url][/size][/color]

Changelog:
-Added another face, no makeup.
